description: Try our easy to follow Veggie Burgers recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Vegie burger,Pescatarian,Halal,Quick & easy dinner,High protein,Seafood free,Vegetarian,Quick & easy lunch,Tomato,Low fat
name: Veggie Burgers Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the vegetable burgers following the packet instructions.
Place buttermilk, mayonnaise and basil in a food processor and process until smooth. Season. Transfer to a jug.

Place the base of each bread roll onto a serving plate. Top with lettuce, tomato, carrot and vegetable burger. Run a peeler along the length of the cucumber to form ribbons. Pile cucumber ribbons onto burgers and spoon over mayonnaise sauce. Add bread roll tops. Serve.
